PSCT.Base: If you have 3 or more cards in your hand (other than this card), and none of them are monsters: Banish your entire hand face-up; add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand. If you do, you cannot Normal or Special Summon any monsters for the rest of this turn, except monsters with that name.
